title: Chicken Salad With Lettuce And Beetroot
summary: Chicken Salad With Lettuce And Beetroot is a gluten free and primal recipe with 20 servings. One serving contains 15 calories, 1g of protein, and 1g of fat. For 6 cents per serving, this recipe covers 1% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe from Home Cooking Adventure has 1 fans. Head to the store and pick up 5- lettuce leaves, lemon juice, chicken breast, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 3 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 7%. This score is very bad (but still fixable). Similar recipes include Chicken Salad with Lettuce and Beetroot, Broccoli, Beetroot And Lettuce, and Beetroot, Avocado And Lettuce.
instructions: Cut chicken breast in 3 4 long strips. In a medium frying pan melt butter over medium high heat. Add chicken strips and sprinkle salt and pepper. Don't touch the breasts for at least 2-3 minutes until forms a golden crust. Flip the chicken and leave it on the other side another few minutes. When done sprinkle lemon juice all over it.Cut or rip the lettuce leaves and sprinkle with extra virgin olive oil or cold pressed sunflower oil. Add the chicken strips and beet roots salad, sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.

steps.step: Cut chicken breast in 3 4 long strips. In a medium frying pan melt butter over medium high heat.

Add chicken strips and sprinkle salt and pepper. Don't touch the breasts for at least 2-3 minutes until forms a golden crust. Flip the chicken and leave it on the other side another few minutes. When done sprinkle lemon juice all over it.
Cut or rip the lettuce leaves and sprinkle with extra virgin olive oil or cold pressed sunflower oil.
Add the chicken strips and beet roots salad, sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
